content.text:
# Astra Film Award for Best Supporting Actress

| image_upright = 0.7
| caption       = The 2024 recipients: Ariana Grande & Zoe Saldaña
| awarded_for   = Best Performance by an Actress in a Supporting Role
| presenter     = Hollywood Creative Alliance
| country       = United States
| year          = Allison Janney  I, Tonya (2017)
| holder        = Ariana Grande  Wicked (2024) / Zoe Saldaña  Emilia Pérez (2024)
| website       =
}}
The Astra Film Award for Best Supporting Actress is one of the annual awards given out by the Hollywood Creative Alliance.
Winners
* † = Winner of the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress
* ‡ = Nominated of the Academy Award for Best Supporting Actress
